about.text1: Born in 1989, raised in Sonora, Mexico and graduated from the Universidad Tecnologica del Sur de Sonora (UTS), I am a Software Engineer with 6 years of experience developing web and desktop applications. I work directly with Global Clients, constantly learning and implementing new technologies in the software industry.
about.text2: My main goal is to enhance my professional skills in the field of computer systems and be a fundamental pillar for the sustainability of projects.
about.text3: My hobbies are rock music, singing, watching series, learning different technologies and spending time with my family.
